0.user_question: Alain's mom bought 2937405 packs of red pens and also bought twice the amount of black pens than the red. If each pack has 2937405 pens, how many pens does Alain have?

ost_step.1: Mom bought 2937405 packs of red pens.
ost_step.2: She bought twice as much black pens which means she got 2 * 2937405 = 5874810 packs of black pens.

direct_answer.text: Firstly let us find out how many red pen packets our mother buys which equals \( \text{Number_of\_red_pen_packs} = 2937405 \) . Next we calculate the Number of Black Pen Packets Our Mother Buys using formula i.e.,\( \text{Number_of_black_pen_packs} =  2*(\text{Number_of_red_pen_packs}) = 2*(2937405) = 5874810 \) , here multiplication operator (*) denotes times (multiplication). Finally We Find Out Total No Of Pens That Aaron Has Using Formula Given As Follows,\begin{align*}&\text{Total no__of_pens}_= (\text{No__OfRedPenPacks}+\text{No__OfBlackPenPacks})\times{\text{number_\_{in_each_pack}}\\&=(2937405+5874810)\times2937405 \\&=8812215 \times 2937405.\end{align*} Here addition
